name: All Shall Fall
description:
Use your shockwave gun to propell yourself through the air and send enemies flying into deadly pits

Made for Brackeys Game Jam #3 where the theme was "Holes"

My first very own gamejam entry.
It was a lot harder than I expected.

Near the end things went horribly wrong- but here it is!

Assets used:
  • prototype textures - Unity Asset store
  • probuilder - Unity Asset store
  • font - https://www.dafont.com/long-shot.font
